headline: Gilead Sciences (NasdaqGS:GILD) Showcases Promising Liver Disease Treatments At EASL Congress
summary: Gilead Sciences (NasdaqGS:GILD) recently announced a presentation at the EASL Congress focusing on liver disease, with promising research in both hepatitis B and C. This comes alongside solid Q1 earnings results where a significant net income turnaround was noted. These developments, combined with a quarterly dividend declaration and ongoing share buybacks, potentially supported a 13% share price increase over the last quarter. Meanwhile, the general market showed strength with a 7% rise,...

headline: Gilead to Present Latest Advancements Across Primary Biliary Cholangitis and Viral Hepatitis
summary: FOSTER CITY, Calif., April 29, 2025--Gilead Sciences, Inc. (Nasdaq:GILD) today announced new research to be presented at the European Association for the Study of the Liver (EASL) Congress, May 7-10, 2025, Amsterdam, furthering Gilead’s commitment to transform the lives of people living with liver disease.
